games.title: Color Pixels - Coloring by Numbers
games.description: Immerse yourself in a delightful realm of art and tranquility with Color Pixels - Coloring by Numbers. Easily turn black-and-white images into colorful creations by following the numbered instructions. This free online game offers a fun way to unwind, whether on a phone or computer, allowing everyone to achieve beautiful results.
games.howToPlayText:
Your task is to transform black-and-white images into vibrant works of art by coloring them by numbers. You can play on both computers and touch devices like phones and tablets.

Controls:
1. Select a category from the gallery, then choose a picture to get started.
2. Zoom in or out: Use the slider at the top of the screen, pinch gestures, or your mouse wheel to focus on details.
3. Pick a color: Choose the desired color from the palette at the bottom of the screen.
4. Color by numbers: Find the corresponding areas and bring the picture to life with color.
5. Use boosters: Speed up the coloring process with special tools and achieve the best results.

games.title: Noob saves the village
games.description: The village has been attacked by merciless monsters! Become a real hero and defeat dangerous enemies with your fighting skills!
games.howToPlayText:
Moving around on the computer using the keyboard, attacking by pressing the left mouse button. 

Move around on mobile devices using joysticks and attack by clicking on the corresponding button.

games.title: Grid Odyssey: Nonograms
games.description: Grid Odyssey: Nonograms â€“ A Captivating Logic Puzzle! Uncover hidden images by filling in the correct squares based on numerical clues. This game sharpens attention, logic, and analytical thinking while providing a satisfying puzzle-solving experience. Ready to reveal the secrets of each pixel? Try it now!
games.howToPlayText: Click or tap on the grid to place a mark. You can switch between crosses or squares on the bottom

games.title: Mystery Digger
games.description: Join the exciting journey of **Mystery Digger**, an addictive idle clicker game. Explore underground for treasures and stories. Upgrade your drill with each click to uncover fascinating finds. Enjoy this calming game on any device and satisfy your curiosity with every discovery.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard: Control is carried out by pressing buttons on the screen. 
Mobile: Control is carried out by pressing buttons on the screen.

games.title: Pixel Differences
games.description: Compare the two images. Each of them contains items that look different from those in the other. Your task is to find them. At the top, you can see how many items you need to find.

games.title: Balls: Pixel Art
games.description: The goal of the game is to break the picture, to pass the level. To do this you have a cannon, which fires a charge of 16 balls. You have a total of 15 attempts to completely eliminate the painting. Good luck!
games.howToPlayText:
Hold your left mouse button and move your cursor to point the balls at the target. 
On mobile slide your finger.
